data.oai_dc:dc: All records supplied by Defra Family Organisations, including Natural England, Environment Agency and Forectry Commission. The quality and precision of the data varies and is dependent on the information originally supplied to SER by the organisation. This is only summary data and further information on individual records may be available direct from SER.|To inform on the biodiversity of Staffordshire, with an emphasis on protected and priority species.|36,173 occurrences
